City Secretary
--------------

City Secretary
--------------

118 E. Richmond Street, Giddings, Texas 78942

**Mailing Address:**
118 E. Richmond Street, Giddings, Texas 78942

Monday through Friday, 8:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m.

**Phone:**
(979) 540-2714

(979) 542-0950

[citysec@giddings.net](mailto:%20citysec@giddings.net)

The City Secretary’s office is dedicated to serving the demands of the public and rendering the best quality service by recognizing its responsibilities to the people, inspiring public confidence and respect, and believing that honest, integrity, loyalty, and courtesy form the basis of good government.

Contact Information
-------------------

* (979) 540-2710

  8:00am - 5:00pm
